mushaf.title: Quran
mushaf.description: You can navigate between pages by swiping right or left

description.text: The top menu displays information about the current page such as the Surah name, Juz number, and the eighth position within the Juz.
You can track your daily Ward progress through the circular progress indicator.
Navigation icon: Allows you to quickly navigate to a specific page or verse.
Search icon: Allows you to search within the text of the Holy Quran.
Fullscreen icon: Shows or hides the bottom menu to display the page in full.
You can access the search page from the top menu in the Quran, which allows you to search within the text of the Holy Quran.
Simple search: Displays results matching the entered text directly.
Advanced search feature: Can be activated by pressing the search icon, providing more precise search options.
You can access the navigation page from the top menu in the Quran.
It allows you to quickly navigate to a specific Surah through the Surah list.
You can easily navigate between specific pages and verses in any Surah of the Holy Quran.
This feature helps you navigate quickly and easily through the Holy Quran.
Track your daily progress in reading the Quran through the progress bar that displays the completion percentage.
The app shows you the number of Ahzab or pages you have read from the daily Ward.
You can easily adjust the daily Ward goal using the increase or decrease buttons.
The app displays the last page you stopped at yesterday to help you continue.
You can display the daily Ward interface by tapping from the top menu of the app.
You can customize your app experience through the Settings page.
Settings include: enable or disable page flip sound, daily Ward notification, adjust night mode brightness, enable notifications (Juz/Hizb/Disable), choose recitation (Hafs/Warsh), and reset the app.
You can access the Settings page from the bottom menu.
